评论详情: I'm old enough to remember when lots of young ladies wore dresses like this. It's really a delightful style. I needed it as a costume in a period play.  PROS: looks like photo, attractive retro style  CONS: material is a bit stiff (but washing may soften it)
True to size
Wore in strawberry festival parade. Was grand marshal

评论概述: So many compliments on this dress!
评论详情: This dress is a great value for the price. It is good quality and the material is thick enough hold its shape. It is not see through at all which was my worry since the style I purchased is mostly white. I am 5’2, 155 lbs in a size medium. I have a large chest (DDD), the cut of this dress gives them the right amount of space while still fitting my body well and maintaining modesty.
I bought this for a lemon-themed bridal shower. It’s comfortable and inexpensive so served it’s purpose but it’s not a breathable fabric so it was very hot at this summer daytime event.

评论概述: Cute! Size down for a fitted look.
评论详情: I ordered based on the sizing chart and keep in mind that this is a thick stretchy poly fabric. Think really nice vintage polyester. My dress ended up being too big because I didn't take into account for the forgiving stretch. For reference, I am 5'6" 200lbs 46" bust, 38" waist, typically a size 16, and ordered an XXL based on measurements. I needed to size down to at least an XL as the dress kept sliding around and wasn't as fitted as I would have liked. The cut is modest, I could easily wear this to the office, and the length hit just below the knee. The sleeves were comfortable and the zipper was easy to close. Everything about this dress is lovely, especially the strawberry pattern! I want them all!
Saw this pattern and really needed it. I get a lot of compliments on it.

评论概述: Great dress but why a poor quality zipper?
评论详情: I own multiple Belle Poque dresses and I love them because they are cute, comfortable and affordable. But what I don't love is how delicate the zippers are on their dresses. Belle Poque use better quality zippers. I feel like the zippers will break easily or get caught easily. This dress had a VERY POOR zipper so unfortunately I'm sending this dress back, which is a shame because this dress looked very cute.

The dress style was pretty cute, but the fabric is very see-through. I didn’t realize how transparent it could be through the strawberry print, but the fabric is very thin. Feels fine, just thin enough to see through so I would recommend a slip underneath. I returned it instead.
Nice dress for plus size ladies. The fabric and value are spot on. The lemons are nice and bright.
Perfect summer dress, I have received a lot of compliments on it as well and it fits true to size. I’m 5’5 and 146lbs and the medium is a perfect fit.

I absolutely LOVE this dress. Except one thing. The bust is a bit big for a “medium”. Either it’s too big or it’s super low. I’m constantly adjusting, pulling it back down to keep it from riding up and bunching at the bust. I’m a 32C (teardrop) so I’m not a tiny busted chick. Other than that it’s a gorgeous dress, beautiful color and pattern. I feel like I’ve stepped out of the past in it. Everyone loves it. I’m 5’8”, 165 lbs, very athletic build. Waste 28ish inches, hips 42, I have wider shoulders, the medium fit well. Originally bought a large but it was too big.
I love the print and it’s well made: I typically wear XL but I bought a 3x and it’s only slightly loose.
I really love this dress, the fit is fine and it's quite pretty. The fabric is of good quality which makes it a joy to wear.

评论概述: Love this dress!! Best dress I’ve ever had next to my wedding gown!
评论详情: I love the fit of this dress! I am 5’10” and about 180 pounds with size 36DD chest. The top gives me a wonderful empire waist line and the length is just to my knees. It doesn’t give me back or boob fat, very smooth under arms. The fabric is high quality and doesn’t show dark underwear shades through the fabric (I checked to make sure panty colors don’t peek through). I’m getting another pattern!
The dress is ok. Not what I was expecting. Too short.
Very cute and comfortable. Can’t wait to wear this on my 1940s themed trip.

评论概述: Lovely Lemon dress  for my Summer Lemon Love Event
评论详情: Fits great and has a nice swing to it. Very vintage style and the perfect stretch. I will but again from this company
I live this dress. It is quite flattering.
Cute dress. Looks good on a petite figure.
I washed this once, and it already has tiny elastic fibers surfacing all over the dress. The good news is, I love the fit and look of this dress. I wish it was offered in a different material.
Nice material and fits well.

I loved the fabric and the print, I got the lemon, but it was too small. I wear a 6/8 and bought the M. It was too tight, especially in the bust. There was no seam room to let it out so I had to return it.
